name: Only 1 (Jumbo Jump)
description:
Intro :

Hey, just a fun game I made. Have fun. Check out the video if you're interested in the development.

How To Play :

You have 1 minute to finish 1 level. It will take you a couple of tries to get to the end.  Remember, all your progress from your other tries stays the same.

Controls :

A S D - Move around

Space - Jump

R - Restart

Esc - Quit

Final Notes : Nothing really to say here.  Let me know your thoughts in your comments. Video :
